synopsis.text: Nally, a girl residing in a frosty realm, yearns for the comfort of warm food. When a lively puppy named Poko leaps out of a refrigerator and leads a young boy named Misuke into this icy world, an exciting adventure unfolds. Misuke and Poko embark on a quest to find warm food for Nally, but the harsh reality of their new environment becomes apparent as everything freezes almost instantly. This enchanting tale is encapsulated in a short animated piece, originally designed to attract new students to Yamaha electric organ classes. Prepare for a heartwarming journey filled with friendship and determination in this icy world of adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
